channel.title: Zig on Data Artificer and code:Breaker
channel.description: Recent content in Zig on Data Artificer and code:Breaker

item.title: 2025 Year of Zig
item.description: Intro Link to heading Programming languages come and go and during my 20 years of coding I have used many of them to at least some degree (more than just hello world). Thanks to ThePrimeagen I decided to take Zig for a spin. And boy I really like it! Just look at the mascot: Come on, a crocodile with a jetpack? How cool is that? Why Zig Link to heading Sure I would not invest a lot of time into anything that a full time YouTuber recommends.
